subject: You have signed for delivery of your Howdens products

rows.text: Thank you for signing the delivery note for your Howdens products. Our team may try to call you over the next few days to follow up on your experience.
If you need to change any of your details then please contact the lender directly:

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
